description: Lob`s Clawitzer faced Pikachu in a Pok√©mon World Championships Normal Class battle in Shalour City during the Battle Festival Challenge. Despite a good tactic to defend against Pikachu`s Thunderbolt by using Flash Cannon to absorb the energy, it didn`t last too long in the battle as Pikachu`s Iron Tail knocked it out to give Ash Ketchum the match victory.
name: Bloster (Rob)
